Platt, Tara


Alternate names: Zoe Oliver
Birthday: Jun 18, 1978
Website: http://www.taraplatt.com
Member Favorites: 106
More:
Birth Place: Fairfax, Virginia

She is the wife of fellow voice actor Yuri Lowenthal.
Certified Hypnotherapist, Therapeutic Imagery Facilitator and Neuro-Linguistic Programing Practitioner
She is a certified Shambhalla Feng Shui Consultant.

Twitter: @taraplatt
IG: @taraplatt
